## UserGroupOptions interface

(Optional) payload passed to the method [RelationBDTO.getUsersGroups()](./clm-core.relationbdto.getusersgroups.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface UserGroupOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [localRootGroups?](./clm-core.usergroupoptions.localrootgroups.md) |  | boolean | <p><i>(Optional)</i> Whether to only show the root-groups of the user or not.</p><p>// \* Example A: User is enrolled in Group-1 with following hierarchy Group-1-<!-- -->&gt; Group-2 -<!-- -->&gt; Group-<!-- -->&gt; 3. Only Group 1 will be returned.</p><p>Example B: User is enrolled in Group-1, Group-2 with following hierarchy Group-1-<!-- -->&gt; Group-2 -<!-- -->&gt; Group-<!-- -->&gt; 3. Group-1 and Group-2 will be returned.</p> |
